EditorContent.noFieldsEmptyStateText: No fields match your criteria, try to broaden your filters.
EditorContent.tutoCardP1: Here, you can check out the fundamental features of the translations editor.
EditorContent.tutoCardP2: You can start by double clicking on the directory below and compare the CSV file with an older version to restore it or just load the current one in the editor.
EditorContent.tutoCardP3: (Note that some features such as deleting or uploading a file are disabled for the sake of the demo).

RestoreSessionDialog.title: Restore last session?
RestoreSessionDialog.description: Do you want to restore your last session of {{date}} ago?

DeleteObjectDialog.title: Delete file?
DeleteObjectDialog.description: This will permanently delete the file and all copies of it from your storage.

FilterDialog.title: Choose which type of content you wish to filter

"{{name}}" is not supported.
File type must be .csv.
DropZone.fileTooBig:
"{{name}}" is not supported.
File size cannot exceed {{maxSize}}. (Current size: {{size}}).
DropZone.invalidHeaderContent:
"{{name}}" is not supported.
Make sure the first row contains the name of each columns without any errors.
For more information, check out the <4>supported file structures</4>.

FilterType.DELIVERY_METHOD_DEFINITION: The delivery method definition. For example, "Standard", or "Expedited".
FilterType.PRODUCT_OPTION: An online store custom product property name. For example, "Size", "Color", or "Material".

FileCard.noFilesEmptyStateText: Upload a file to get started.

PreviewCard.name: Name:
PreviewCard.noDifferencesEmptyStateText: There is no differences between the two versions.
PreviewCard.compareEmptyStateText: Compare fields between the most recent and older versions of the same file.
PreviewCard.previewEmptyStateText: Click on a file or sub-folder to have more information about it.

Tutorial.firstTxt:
On the top left, you can find the filtering tools:

1. The search bar to filter your translations by keywords
2. The "Filter by type" dialog to only show certain types of fields
3. The column menu to show the desired values out of each row
Tutorial.secondTxt:
On the top right, you can find the main file actions:

1. Delete file from storage
2. Upload a new file from your computer
3. Save your modifications
4. Download the file on your computer
5. Open this tutorial
Tutorial.thirdTxt: On the bottom left, you can select the number of rows to display in the editor.
Tutorial.fourthTxt:
On the bottom right, you will find the tools to navigate through the file:

1. Enter a page number and press Return to go there directly
2. Press the arrows to go to the previous or next page
